title: (1) of section 7 of the Institutional Burials Act 2022 (No. 18 of 2022), having
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Institutional Burials Act 2022 (Director
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Institutional Burials Act 2022 (Director 

of Authorised Intervention, Tuam) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited institutional burial act 2022 (director authorised intervention tuam) order 2022

title: (1) of section 7 of the Institutional Burials Act 2022 (No. 18 of 2022), having
heading: In this Order, "Act of 2022" means the Institutional Burials Act 2022.
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, "Act of 2022" means the Institutional Burials Act 2022.
text_norm: 2 order act 2022 mean institutional burial act 2022

title: (1) of section 7 of the Institutional Burials Act 2022 (No. 18 of 2022), having
heading: (a) The Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and
text_raw:
3. 

(a) The Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth shall, in accordance with section 9 of the Act of 2022, 
establish an Office of Director of Authorised Intervention. 

(b) The Director shall perform the additional function set out in 

section 10(l)(ii) of the Act of 2022. 

(c) The land, in respect of which the Director may perform his or 
her functions set out in paragraphs (a) to (k) of section 10 of the 
Act of 2022, and the additional function referred to in paragraph 
(b), is the land identified on the map appended to this Order. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 7th October, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [518] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

4 October, 2022. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
